(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (EX There))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (JJ popular))
        (VP (VBG saying)
          (PP (IN amongst)
            (NP (DT the) (NNPS Hokkiens)))
          (SBAR (IN that)
            (S
              (NP (NNP Teochews))
              (VP (VBP are)
                (ADVP (RB very)
                  (NP
                    (NP (`` ``) (NNP Hao) (NNP Lian) ('' ''))
                    (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
                      (NP (NNP Proud))
                      (-RRB- -RRB-))))))))))
    (. .)))


expl(is-2, There-1)
root(ROOT-0, is-2)
det(popular-4, a-3)
nsubj(is-2, popular-4)
partmod(popular-4, saying-5)
prep(saying-5, amongst-6)
det(Hokkiens-8, the-7)
pobj(amongst-6, Hokkiens-8)
mark(are-11, that-9)
nsubj(are-11, Teochews-10)
ccomp(saying-5, are-11)
advmod(are-11, very-12)
nn(Lian-15, Hao-14)
pobj(very-12, Lian-15)
appos(Lian-15, Proud-18)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Well))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Well-1)


(ROOT
  (SBAR
    (WHADVP (WRB when))
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VBP meet)
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (NN hawker))
          (PP (IN like)
            (NP (DT the) (NNP Mr) (NNP Sim) (, ,))))))))


advmod(meet-3, when-1)
nsubj(meet-3, you-2)
root(ROOT-0, meet-3)
det(hawker-5, a-4)
dobj(meet-3, hawker-5)
prep(hawker-5, like-6)
det(Sim-9, the-7)
nn(Sim-9, Mr-8)
pobj(like-6, Sim-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP
      (VP (MD ca) (RB n't)
        (VP (VB help)))
      (CC but)
      (VP (VBP agree)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (EX there))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (NP
                (NP (DT some) (NN element))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP
                    (NP (NN truth))
                    (PP (IN in)
                      (NP (PRP it)))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(help-4, you-1)
aux(help-4, ca-2)
neg(help-4, n't-3)
root(ROOT-0, help-4)
cc(help-4, but-5)
conj(help-4, agree-6)
mark(is-9, that-7)
expl(is-9, there-8)
ccomp(agree-6, is-9)
det(element-11, some-10)
nsubj(is-9, element-11)
prep(element-11, of-12)
pobj(of-12, truth-13)
prep(truth-13, in-14)
pobj(in-14, it-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VBG Having)
      (VP (VBN blogged)
        (ADVP (RB so))
        (NP (JJ many) (NN hawker) (NNS stalls))
        (, ,)))))


aux(blogged-2, Having-1)
root(ROOT-0, blogged-2)
advmod(blogged-2, so-3)
amod(stalls-6, many-4)
nn(stalls-6, hawker-5)
dobj(blogged-2, stalls-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (JJ inevitable))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (WHADVP (WRB when))
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBP chance)
            (PP (IN upon)
              (NP
                (NP (DT a) (NN hawker))
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WDT that))
                  (S
                    (VP (VBZ is)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT a) (NN bit))
                        (PP (IN of)
                          (NP (DT a) (NNP Food) (NNP Nazi)))))))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(inevitable-3, it-1)
cop(inevitable-3, is-2)
root(ROOT-0, inevitable-3)
mark(chance-7, that-4)
advmod(chance-7, when-5)
nsubj(chance-7, I-6)
ccomp(inevitable-3, chance-7)
prep(chance-7, upon-8)
det(hawker-10, a-9)
pobj(upon-8, hawker-10)
nsubj(bit-14, that-11)
cop(bit-14, is-12)
det(bit-14, a-13)
rcmod(hawker-10, bit-14)
prep(bit-14, of-15)
det(Nazi-18, a-16)
nn(Nazi-18, Food-17)
pobj(of-15, Nazi-18)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (EX there))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT a)
        (ADJP (RB very) (JJ big))
        (NN chance))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP he))
          (VP (MD would)
            (VP (VB turn)
              (PRT (RP out))
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB be)
                    (NP (DT a) (NNP Teochew))))))))))
    (. .)))


expl(is-2, there-1)
root(ROOT-0, is-2)
det(chance-6, a-3)
advmod(big-5, very-4)
amod(chance-6, big-5)
nsubj(is-2, chance-6)
mark(turn-10, that-7)
nsubj(turn-10, he-8)
aux(turn-10, would-9)
ccomp(is-2, turn-10)
prt(turn-10, out-11)
aux(Teochew-15, to-12)
cop(Teochew-15, be-13)
det(Teochew-15, a-14)
xcomp(turn-10, Teochew-15)
